Package edu.cnm.deepdive.bard.service

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SpotifyServiceProxy
    Service Proxy for Incorporating Spotify Service and Endpoints
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BardDatabase
    Class representing the Database.
    BardDatabase.Converters
    Class holding Converter Methods for Various data types
    SongRepository
    Repository for handling the interaction between the Song Dao and the Music ViewModel
    SpotifyServiceProxy.InstanceHolder  
    SpotifySignInService
    Class for Authorization services provided by the Spotify API and Sign-in functionality
    TaskRepository
    Repository for handling the interaction between the Task Dao and the Session and TaskType ViewModels
    UserRepository
    Repository for handling the interaction between the Task Dao and the Session and TaskType ViewModels
